Properties

Optional clean

clean: boolean
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:229

Remove website elements, such as links, ads, etc.

Optional fallback_to_raw

fallback_to_raw: boolean
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:233

Whether to use raw HTML content if text cleaning fails.

features

features: Features
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:221

Specific features to analyze the document for.

Optional headers

headers: Object
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:240

Optional html

html: string

The HTML file to analyze.

Optional language

language: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:237

ISO 639-1 code indicating the language to use in the analysis.

Optional limit_text_characters

limit_text_characters: number
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:239

Sets the maximum number of characters that are processed by the service.

Optional return_analyzed_text

return_analyzed_text: boolean
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:235

Whether or not to return the analyzed text.

Optional text

text: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:223

The plain text to analyze.

Optional url

url: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:227

The web page to analyze.

Optional xpath

xpath: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:231

XPath query for targeting nodes in HTML.
